channel.title: Nano #0.1 - IRC bot
channel.description:
This is basically my last bot with a few more features, and I used [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,455403.msg3334550.html#msg3334550]Fat_Cookie's code[/url] which he told me to use.
This is an updated revision of the [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,455403.0.html]jAP IRC bot[/url].
[b]Features include but are not limited to:[/b]
[ul][li]Access list[/li] [li]Translation from any language[/li] [li]Artificial Intelligence[/li] [li]Access loading[/li][/ul]
[b]SYNTAX'S:[/b] $acc[cmd] (EX: $accadd name level) ($accdel name) ($accget name) ($accban name) ($accclear) $translate:msg:first language(the language of the message):second language (what you want it to translate to)
[b]NOTE:[/b] [i]This bot is not amazing, but it is much better than my previous bot. I kept the hard-coding to a minimum and deleted tons of useless features.[/i]
[b]ALSO NOTE:[/b] [i]This uses a loading feature, so make a folder in C:\ called 'NetBeansIsBad' and make a few text files, 'words', 'ops', 'admins', 'allowed', and 'banned'[/i]
[b]PLEASE ALSO NOTE THIS AS WELL:[/b] [i]It uses the google language api, it is a very simple search...[/i]
[hr]
[b]CODE[/b]
no

item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

This is as horrible (the removed images of those facepalms can express how bad it is) as my first IRC bot (which is really shit).

Edit: Perhaps people will modify this like how they did to WinterLove and we’ll see better changes in the next 4 years? Oh wait…

item.title: Nano #0.1 - IRC bot
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I know it’s not your code, I’m just illustrating how putting extra code in is pointless.

And my sentence meant that I don’t see the reason of writing extra code when you don’t have too.

Read full topic

item.title: Nano #0.1 - IRC bot
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

int i = 0;
i++;
i–;
i++;
i–;
i++;
i–;

I guess I just don’t see the reason to have code you don’t need to.

Read full topic

item.title: Nano #0.1 - IRC bot
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:367694”]It’s not about being lazy, it’s about cleaner code

Your method makes a bunch of files you don’t need, it’s easier to just use one. And you can split it with anything…[/quote]

Yeah I know, I was just wondering about your reasoning for \t.

Honestly, I don’t care much for clean code, as long as it is working code. I understand how easy it would be to split the line, and that it is no big deal at all, but there’s no reason to change code that will do the same thing in the end.

Read full topic

item.title: Nano #0.1 - IRC bot
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s not about being lazy, it’s about cleaner code

Your method makes a bunch of files you don’t need, it’s easier to just use one. And you can split it with anything…

Read full topic

item.title: Nano #0.1 - IRC bot
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

protip - if you’re using something really often (out.write; out.flush) make a new method for it

void write(String s) { out.write(s); out.flush(); }

also, for your rights, have one file rights.text formatted like:

nick\trights nick\trightsAnd when you read the file, just split it with \t and add each element to the hashmap
easy as conic sections

Read full topic

item.title: Nano #0.1 - IRC bot
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

This is basically my last bot with a few more features, and I used Fat_Cookie’s code which he told me to use.

This is an updated revision of the jAP IRC bot.

Features include but are not limited to:

[ul][li]Access list[/li]
[li]Translation from any language[/li]
[li]Artificial Intelligence[/li]
[li]Access loading[/li][/ul]

SYNTAX’S:
$acc[cmd] (EX: $accadd name level) ($accdel name) ($accget name) ($accban name) ($accclear)
$translate:msg:first language(the language of the message):second language (what you want it to translate to)

NOTE:
This bot is not amazing, but it is much better than my previous bot. I kept the hard-coding to a minimum and deleted tons of useless features.

ALSO NOTE:
This uses a loading feature, so make a folder in C:\ called ‘NetBeansIsBad’ and make a few text files, ‘words’, ‘ops’, ‘admins’, ‘allowed’, and ‘banned’

PLEASE ALSO NOTE THIS AS WELL:
It uses the google language api, it is a very simple search…

[hr]

CODE

no

Read full topic
